contentList.content: When Mithrandir sailed for the undying lands, he left this sword behind. I had seen it many times... Yet after its fight with the Balrog, it seems to direct lightning a little to well. Be mindful of watery places. -Golvagor, Rivendell Bladesmith
You deal an additional 1 - 6 damage against Goblin, Hobgoblin, Bugbear and Half-Orc type enemies.
You have Advantage against Fiend type enemies.
Reddish by sun, pale and cold by moon... Never had the sheen of a blade set me in awe as the reforged sword of Gondor's king. -Golvagor, Rivendell Bladesmith

I am in both fear and awe at what it is said it does to Orkkind. Unfortunately, it was stolen from King Thorin's tomb. My only hope is that its new bearer uses it for good. -Golvagor, Rivendell Bladesmith

Before Bilbo Baggins' arrival I had yet to encouter on of the little folk, much less one wearing a sword from Gondolin. Many years later, another Hobbit came to the vale, bearing the same sword along with a great burden. -Golvagor, Rivendell Bladesmith
You have Advantage against Spider type enemies.
It once belonged to Lady Idril and was passed down to Queen Arwen who kept it at Minas Tirith until her eventual death. What became of the sword, none can say. -Golvagor, Bladesmith
You deal an additional 1 - 6 damage against Dragon type enemies
This Staff was found near Zirakzigil close to the Balrog's corpse. - Golvagor, Rivendell Bladesmith
